paper_title: Temperature-dependent discovery of BCC refractory multi-principal element alloys: Integrating deep learning and CALPHAD calculations

claims.claim: When trained on the dataset, the MLP achieves an RMSE of 0.00044 ± 0.000054 on the training set, evaluated at the epoch with the lowest error.
instruction: Eval.ipynb prints three numbers for Avg and three numbers for SD
Focus only on the first Avg and the first SD
The expected values are Avg[0] ≈ 0.00044 and SD[0] ≈ 0.000054
